actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of title XVIII of the Social Security Act which relate to the definition of "spell of illness".

summary.text: Changes the provisions of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act which relate to the definition of "spell of illness" for purposes of determining eligibility and duration of eligibility for benefits under the Medicare program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of title XVIII of the Social Security Act which relate to the definition of "spell of illness".
